channel.description: Recent content in Wireless on behova.net

item.title: WSU Wireless on Arch Linux
item.description: Intro I’ve found a way to connect my Arch-Linux laptop to the WSU WIFI reliably. Since I had a bit of difficulty figuring this out on my own I thought I would document it here. I’m assuming you already have wifi capability set-up, and have connected to other networks. I am using Network Manager. With the nmcli to connect to networks normally. But I found it easier to use nmtui, when dealing with networks that need a username and a password.
